name: Elysium Aviation Academy
about: Elysium Aviation Academy, established in 2019 in Kathmandu, Nepal, is a specialized institution focused on human capital development in the aviation industry. The academy offers a range of tailored training programs, including cargo courses, certified passenger ground services, certified airport ramp services, and certified aviation security awareness. Led by experienced professionals such as Bharat Shrestha and Sharad Kafley, who have extensive backgrounds in ground operations and airline management, the academy provides comprehensive and practical training. Students praise the courses for their informative and engaging content, real-life examples, and professional instructors. Elysium Aviation Academy is committed to equipping individuals with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the aviation industry.
services: ["Certified Trainings\nDangerous Goods Regulations Training\nElysium Tailored Trainings"]
